transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha ji Faisal sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha ji sir, abhi I hope aapka discussion hua hoga sir aapke feedback ke regarding Romit Romit ke saath, hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ha ji sir, toh saari cheeze aapko sir samajh mein aa gayi, jo bhi cheez unhone guide kiya sir aapko?
Customer: Haan haan, toh baat ho gayi toh.
Executive: Achha, baaki aapka concern mein close kar raha tha sir, jo aapka concern open hua tha. But ek mera request tha sir, mera call karne ka main purpose tha jaise sir teen jo products hai na aapke jiska discussion hua hoga Romit ke saath aapka, file bag, multipurpose bag aur gadget organizer bag sir, hai na? Iske aapne sir har ek product ke teen-teen buyleads consume kiye hai aapne but is product ko aapne add nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Toh agar request hoga toh matlab Romit ne toh add kar diya hai product ka naam ke saath aapka but uska ek baar product ke image vagera ya detail vagera agar aap over the WhatsApp aap hame share kar dete toh saari cheeze hum proper tarike se sir add kar lete hai yaha pe.
Executive: Jaise koi bhi buyer agar
Customer: Boliye.
Customer: Woh toh already add hai woh item, woh product.
Executive: Sorry sir, kya bol rahe ho aap?
Customer: Woh woh product mere paas woh already add hai document organizer bag ke naam se.
Executive: Achha achha. Sahi hai sahi hai.
Executive: Baaki koi bhi issue hota hai toh aap aap I hope aapke paas number hoga Pooja aapke jo account handle karti hai, hai na? Either aap chahe toh hame bhi connect kar sakte hai, thik hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Okay okay. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive requests product images via WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Customer states product already added.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product details, buyleads, product addition
